get.description: Returns the list of short URLs.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to be displayed. Defaults to 1

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The amount of items to return on every page. Defaults to 10

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: A query used to filter results by searching for it on the longUrl and shortCode fields. (Since v1.3.0)

parameters.name: tags[]
parameters.description: A list of tags used to filter the result set. Only short URLs tagged with at least one of the provided tags will be returned. (Since v1.3.0)

parameters.name: tagsMode
parameters.description: Tells how the filtering by tags should work, returning short URLs containing "any" of the tags, or "all" the tags. It's ignored if no tags are provided, and defaults to "any" if not provided.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The field from which you want to order the result.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) from which we want to get short URLs.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) until which we want to get short URLs.

shortCode.description: The short code for this short URL.

dateCreated.description: The date in which the short URL was created in ISO format.

visitsCount.description: The number of visits that this short URL has received.

tags.description: A list of tags applied to this short URL

validSince.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) from which this short code will be valid

validUntil.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) until which this short code will be valid

maxVisits.description: The maximum number of allowed visits for this short code

domain.description: The domain in which the short URL was created. Null if it belongs to default domain.

title.description: A descriptive title of the short URL.

crawlable.description: Tells if this URL will be included as 'Allow' in Shlink's robots.txt.

forwardQuery.description: Tells if this URL will forward the query params to the long URL when visited, as explained in [the docs](https://shlink.io/documentation/some-features/#query-params-forwarding).

pagesCount.description: The total number of pages that can be obtained.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of items for every page.

itemsInCurrentPage.description: The number of items in current page (could be smaller than itemsPerPage).

totalItems.description: The total number of items among all pages.

post.description:
Creates a new short URL.

**Param findIfExists**: This new param allows to force shlink to return existing short URLs when found based on provided params, instead of creating a new one. However, it might add complexity and have unexpected outputs. These are the use cases: * Only the long URL is provided: It will return the newest match or create a new short URL if none is found. * Long url and custom slug are provided: It will return the short URL when both params match, return an error when the slug is in use for another long URL, or create a new short URL otherwise. * Any of the above but including other params (tags, validSince, validUntil, maxVisits): It will behave the same as the previous two cases, but it will try to exactly match existing results using all the params. If any of them does not match, it will try to create a new short URL.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

longUrl.description: The long URL this short URL will redirect to

validSince.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) from which this short code will be valid

validUntil.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) until which this short code will be valid

maxVisits.description: The maximum number of allowed visits for this short code

validateUrl.description: Tells if the long URL (if provided) should or should not be validated as a reachable URL. If not provided, it will fall back to app-level config

tags.description: The list of tags to set to the short URL.

title.description: A descriptive title of the short URL.

crawlable.description: Tells if this URL will be included as 'Allow' in Shlink's robots.txt.

forwardQuery.description: Tells if the query params should be forwarded from the short URL to the long one, as explained in [the docs](https://shlink.io/documentation/some-features/#query-params-forwarding).

customSlug.description: A unique custom slug to be used instead of the generated short code

findIfExists.description: Will force existing matching URL to be returned if found, instead of creating a new one

domain.description: The domain to which the short URL will be attached

shortCodeLength.description: The length for generated short code. It has to be at least 4 and defaults to 5. It will be ignored when customSlug is provided

validateUrl.description: Tells if the long URL should or should not be validated as a reachable URL. If not provided, it will fall back to app-level config

200.description: The result of parsing the long URL

shortCode.description: The short code for this short URL.

dateCreated.description: The date in which the short URL was created in ISO format.

visitsCount.description: The number of visits that this short URL has received.

tags.description: A list of tags applied to this short URL

validSince.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) from which this short code will be valid

validUntil.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) until which this short code will be valid

maxVisits.description: The maximum number of allowed visits for this short code

domain.description: The domain in which the short URL was created. Null if it belongs to default domain.

title.description: A descriptive title of the short URL.

crawlable.description: Tells if this URL will be included as 'Allow' in Shlink's robots.txt.

forwardQuery.description: Tells if this URL will forward the query params to the long URL when visited, as explained in [the docs](https://shlink.io/documentation/some-features/#query-params-forwarding).

400.description: Some of provided data is invalid. Check extra fields to know exactly what.

url.description: A URL that could not be verified, if the error type is https://shlink.io/api/error/invalid-url

customSlug.description: Provided custom slug when the error type is https://shlink.io/api/error/non-unique-slug

domain.description: The domain for which you were trying to create the new short URL

value.title: Invalid data
value.detail: Provided data is not valid

value.title: Invalid URL
value.detail: Provided URL foo is invalid. Try with a different one.

value.title: Invalid custom slug
value.detail: Provided slug "my-slug" is already in use.

value.title: Invalid data
value.detail: Provided data is not valid

value.title: Invalid URL
value.detail: Provided URL foo is invalid. Try with a different one.

value.title: Invalid custom slug
value.detail: Provided slug "my-slug" is already in use.

parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: The API key used to authenticate the request

parameters.name: longUrl
parameters.description: The URL to be shortened

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format in which you want the response to be returned. You can also use the "Accept" header instead of this

shortCode.description: The short code for this short URL.

dateCreated.description: The date in which the short URL was created in ISO format.

visitsCount.description: The number of visits that this short URL has received.

tags.description: A list of tags applied to this short URL

validSince.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) from which this short code will be valid

validUntil.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) until which this short code will be valid

maxVisits.description: The maximum number of allowed visits for this short code

domain.description: The domain in which the short URL was created. Null if it belongs to default domain.

title.description: A descriptive title of the short URL.

crawlable.description: Tells if this URL will be included as 'Allow' in Shlink's robots.txt.

forwardQuery.description: Tells if this URL will forward the query params to the long URL when visited, as explained in [the docs](https://shlink.io/documentation/some-features/#query-params-forwarding).

400.description: The long URL was not provided or is invalid.

value.title: Invalid URL

totalItems.description: The total number of items among all pages.

get.description: Returns the list of all tags used in any short URL, together with the amount of short URLs and visits for it

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to display. Defaults to 1

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The amount of items to return on every page. Defaults to all the items

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: A query used to filter results by searching for it on the tag name.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description:
To determine how to order the results.

**Important!** Ordering by `shortUrlsCount` or `visitsCount` has a [known performance issue](https://github.com/shlinkio/shlink/issues/1346) which makes loading a subset of the list take as much as loading the whole list.
If you plan to order by any of these fields, it's worth loading the whole list with no pagination.

shortUrlsCount.description: The amount of short URLs using this tag

userAgent.description: The combined amount of visits received by short URLs with this tag

data.description: The tag stats will be returned only if the withStats param was provided with value 'true'

pagesCount.description: The total number of pages that can be obtained.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of items for every page.

itemsInCurrentPage.description: The number of items in current page (could be smaller than itemsPerPage).

totalItems.description: The total number of items among all pages.

get.description: Get general visits stats not linked to one specific short URL.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

visitsCount.description: The total amount of visits received on any short URL.

orphanVisitsCount.description: The total amount of visits that could not be matched to a short URL (visits to the base URL, an invalid short URL or any other kind of 404).

date.description: The date in which the visit was performed

userAgent.description: The user agent from which the visit was performed

potentialBot.description: Tells if Shlink thinks this visit comes potentially from a bot or crawler

pagesCount.description: The total number of pages that can be obtained.

itemsInCurrentPage.description: The number of items in current page (could be smaller than itemsPerPage).

totalItems.description: The total number of items among all pages.

get.description:
Returns the list of all domains that have been either used for some short URL, or have explicitly configured redirects.
It also includes the domain redirects, plus the default redirects that will be used for any non-explicitly-configured one.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

baseUrlRedirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits the domain's base URL

regular404Redirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits a not found URL other than an invalid short URL

invalidShortUrlRedirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits an invalid short URL

baseUrlRedirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits the domain's base URL

regular404Redirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits a not found URL other than an invalid short URL

invalidShortUrlRedirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits an invalid short URL

patch.description: Sets the URLs that you want a visitor to get redirected to for "not found" URLs for a specific domain

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

domain.description: The domain's authority for which you want to set redirects

baseUrlRedirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits the domain's base URL

regular404Redirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits a not found URL other than an invalid short URL

invalidShortUrlRedirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits an invalid short URL

200.description: The domain's redirects after the update, when existing redirects have been merged with provided ones.

baseUrlRedirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits the domain's base URL

regular404Redirect.description: URL to redirect to when a user hits a not found URL other than an invalid short URL

get.description: Returns information to consume updates published by Shlink on a mercure hub. https://mercure.rocks/

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The API version to be consumed

mercureHubUrl.description: The public URL of the mercure hub that can be used to get real-time updates published by Shlink

jwt.description: A JWT with subscribe permissions which is valid with the mercure hub

Represents a short URL. Tracks the visit and redirects tio the corresponding long URL

parameters.name: shortCode

get.description: Generates a 1px transparent image which can be used to track emails with a short URL

parameters.name: shortCode
parameters.description: The short code to resolve.

get.description:
Generates a QR code image pointing to a short URL.
Since this is not an API endpoint but an image one, when an invalid value is provided for any of the query params, they will fall to their default values instead of throwing an error.

parameters.name: shortCode
parameters.description: The short code to resolve.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the image to be returned.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format for the QR code image, being valid values png and svg. Not providing the param or providing any other value will fall back to png.

parameters.name: margin
parameters.description: The margin around the QR code image.

parameters.name: errorCorrection
parameters.description: The error correction level to apply to the QR code: **[L]**ow, **[M]**edium, **[Q]**uartile or **[H]**igh. See [docs](https://www.qrcode.com/en/about/error_correction.html).

parameters.name: roundBlockSize
parameters.description: Allows to disable block size rounding, which might reduce the readability of the QR code, but ensures no extra margin is added.
